contents:
This Dr. Du, he's worse than My Favorite Doctor, Dr. Demon Sperm (Stella Immanuel) . He wants to wipe out the Kantoners, which himself is a BAD HOMBRE. These Monolingual Mandalorian Bad Hombres will not getting their job done 'cause there's a New Sherrif in Town, and its name is The Lao High Whipper!
